text: "Ego" is a 1978 song by Elton John and was released as a standalone single. It was played live from 1978 to 1980 and went to number 34 in the United Kingdom and the United States. It was not available on CD until the 1990 release To Be Continued.... ==References== Category:1978 songs Category:Elton John songs Category:Glam rock songs
title: Ego (Elton John song)
